text: hey everyone its mark Wiens with
migration ology calm I am not eating
anything today but I have something that
I am really excited to announce to you
you have probably seen me wearing this
t-shirt in many many of the food videos
and the t-shirt is now available to buy
but before I tell you more about that I
just want to tell you a quick story
about this t-shirt so when I first moved
to Thailand back in 2009 I taught
English for a year and during that year
I would go to the same restaurant every
day for lunch almost every day for lunch
but I would rotate between different
dishes
I would eat so one day I would order guy
pad pick gang one day I would order pick
up a goon so which is stir-fried chicken
with chili and the next dish is a shrimp
stir-fried with holy basil but as many
of you might know I am addicted and I
find chilies and anything spicy
irresistible that is probably my number
one taste uh yeah I just I just love it
and so the lady you really got to know
me and she was very friendly really nice
to me and so I would go there every day
for lunch and I would order my dish I
would rotate between different dishes
try as many new dishes as I could but
every time I would order it extra spicy
and so after a while once she really got
to know me I would not need to order it
spicy anymore because she knew my
requests and so I would just basically
choose my dish for instance again papaw
boom and I didn't need to order extra
spicy she would just yell out to the
chef she would she would say pug Kapow
goon my pet McGinn and so this reads in
Thai my pet my ginn which means if it's
not spicy I'm not eating so basically
basically she would yell out to the chef
shrimp stir-fried with holy basil if
it's not spicy he's not eating my pet
McGinn and so that is the story behind
this t-shirt the inspiration behind this
t-shirt it's one of my kind of Moana my
first food memories from from Thailand
and one that I love so much because I am
a spicy food love
and so that yeah that's the whole
inspiration behind this t-shirt I hope
you enjoyed this story this true story
the t-shirt is available now click the
